title: Jeb: 第一批Minecon门票全部售罄
author: kaho
txt_content:
本帖最后由 kaho 于 2015-3-28 09:10 编辑 


@jeb_
First batch of Minecon tickets are already sold out! (There may be a few being unlocked from canceled orders, if you're lucky.)
第一批Minecon门票已经全部售罄！（可能有一些取消购买的门票剩下，就看你的运气咯）

本年度Minecon详情：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-423722-1-1.html
